snippet: The slump in manufacturing continued to worsen in September, the latest sign that the country’s economic slowdown appears to be sharpening.
abstract: Chinese manufacturing output survey was 49.8 points in September, compared with 49.7 in August; readings below 50 indicate contraction.
lead_paragraph: The slump in manufacturing continued to worsen in September, the latest sign that the country’s economic slowdown appears to be sharpening.

headline.print_headline: Slowdown Continues for China in Factories
headline.main: Slowdown Continues for China in Factories
